title: Tab bar no longer scrolls when dragging tab in the case of tab strip overflow.
author: C4rb0n
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
When dragging a tab to reposition it in a panel where that tab strip has overflowed, that tab strip no longer scrolls.  This is a regression  in published nightly v1.77.2-nb.

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->
Expect pre-nightly v1.77.2-nb behavior whereby the tab strip scrolled when dragging ...
